description: React component that protects child routes by checking user authentication and admin privileges, redirecting unauthenticated users or unauthorized admins to the home page.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ children, requireAdmin = false })
methods.description: React functional component that renders child components if authentication and authorization conditions are met; otherwise redirects.

ctags.name: ProtectedRoute
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ProtectedRoute({ children, requireAdmin = false }) {$/
